sentence.Network_en: He was by turns devout and obscene, merry and lachrymose.
sentence.Network_cn: 他时而虔诚时而淫秽, 时而欢天喜地,时而凄然泪下.

sentence.Network_en: Maybe if you moved away from Lake Lachrymose you might feel better.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许搬离这悲哀之湖会让你好受一些.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'like tears; liable to exude in drops'): from Latin lacrimosus, from lacrima 'tear'

entry.tran: 动辄哭哭啼啼的；爱掉眼泪的
entry.def: Someone who is lachrymose cries very easily and very often.

example.tran: 送葬者那止不住的泪水
